title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket design for "A Binger Harvest" by E.M. Forester", 1955
medium: Lithography in gold, purple, white and black ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically in black ink at lower right in script: lustig
Across the top in purple, black and white ink: a [purple lowercase] binger harvest [black]/ Essays on books, People and Places by/ E.M FORESTER [white]
Across the bottom in purple and black: MERIDIAN BOOKS [purple] published by The Noonday Press/ MI $1.25 [black]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a gold background. The title, author and publisher names are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover is athe title, author name and a review of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.
